pl.isangeles.senlin.core.skill

Class Skill

  • java.lang.Object
    • pl.isangeles.senlin.core.skill.Skill
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EffectSource, SaveElement, SlotContent
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Attack, Buff, Passive

    public abstract class Skill
extends java.lang.Object
implements SlotContent, SaveElement, EffectSource
    Class for character skills like attacks, spells, etc.
    Author:
    Isangeles

             java.lang.String id,
             java.lang.String imgName,
             EffectType type,
             java.util.List<Requirement> reqs,
             int castTime,
             int cooldown,
             java.util.List<java.lang.String> effects)
        Skill constructor
        Parameters:
        character - Skill owner
        id - Skill ID
        name - Skill Name
        info - Basic informations about this skill
        imgName - Skill icon image
        type - Skill effect type
        magickaCost - Mana cost
        castTime - Casting time
        cooldown - Cooldown time
        useWeapon - If weapon is needed to use this skill
        effects - Skill effect list
